event.title: Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: Software
event.name: Increment
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, software increment

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Memory read
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, load

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Memory write
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, store

event.title: Exception
event.name: Return
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, exception return

event.title: Instruction
event.name: CONTEXTIDR
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, write to CONTEXTIDR

event.title: Branch
event.name: PC change
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, software change of the PC

event.title: Procedure
event.name: Return
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, procedure return

event.title: Memory
event.name: Unaligned access
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, unaligned load or store

event.title: Branch
event.name: Mispredicted
event.description: Mispredicted or not predicted branch speculatively executed

event.title: Memory
event.name: Translation table
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, write to TTBR
